title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes without confirmation
description: When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately without any confirmation or prompt.
OB:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
2.
EB:
When removing a working set, the package view should not be immediately refiltered. Refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working set.
In addition, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working set, including canceling the removal operation.
